page.title: 11ALONG MY ROAD
page.content: The name of my road is{Llangollen Road and the first house in the row belongs to Mr.A.N.Richards.He lives there with his Wife,Son and his Daughter.They are all very friendly and like talking about their past.The next house belongs to Howard and Moira.They are quite young and{very} friendly.They have a dog called Shermy.The next house belongs to Me,My Sister,My Mum and My Dad.We are a happy family although My Sister and I sometimes row.Our address is,{Dee {View,Llangollen Rd Trevor}.The next house belongs to Mr.P.Pepper.He lives there with his two sons and his wife. I don't know much about the two ladies in the next two houses apart from they are both called Mrs.Jones.One is quite young and the other is quite old.A bit further down the road is a pub called the{"AUSTRALIA ARMS".}
